domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @SenBobCasey If you get sick, is it really important for you to know whether what you have is Covid-19? The only reason it is remotely important is to track the disease. At this point there's no containing the virus. If anyone gets sick, they should just assume it's Covid-19 at this point.
